text: The Men's high jump event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 30 and 31 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Alfredo Deza ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Yin Xueli ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Aleksandr Veryutin ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 31 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
